last_episode_to_air.name: Behold, The Universe is Filled With Blessings
last_episode_to_air.overview: The dragon has awoken on the moon, and is threatening to destroy Earth like it did Sirius. Nebula has a plan to seal him, but can the people of Earth put their hatred towards him aside after everything that happened?

name: Planet With
overview: Sōya Kuroi has dreams of people with superpowers fighting a massive dragon in the sky, but his real life is almost as weird. He's had amnesia for about two weeks and been taken in by a maid and an anthropomorphic cat. When a UFO in the shape of a stuffed bear approaches Sorimasaka City and other metros around the world, he's startled to see seven rainbow-sparkling heroes zoom out to confront it – just like in his dream. Even weirder, the maid wants him to leave his shelter to confront these heroes and take the source of their power.

episodes.name: Light, Seven Flashes
episodes.overview: Soya is an ordinary boy, with one problem: He's lost his memories and lives with a giant cat and a maid. To make matters worse, his city is under attack by a giant alien craft, and it doesn't come in peace. It comes in... "Peas"?

episodes.name: Nebula Soldiers
episodes.overview: The first of the seven heroes is down, and Soya is eager to taste his victory katsudon. Could it be delicious pork, or perhaps chicken? At last, meat! But then he finds out... it's vegetarian katsudon!

episodes.name: Avenger 1
episodes.overview: Soya won his battle with Miu, but the rest of Grand Paladin shows up to stop him. In the ensuing battle, he's defeated, and sensei is forced to take drastic measures to keep him from being captured.

episodes.name: Avenger 2
episodes.overview: Haru's armor goes out of control, becoming a massive dragon. To stop it, Grand Paladin and the pacifist faction will have to join forces.

episodes.name: Paladin Break 1
episodes.overview: Grand Paladin's numbers are fading fast, and the Sealing Faction won't stop coming. With nobody left to help Takashi but his own father and the timid Yosuke, will there be anyone to save the Earth?

episodes.name: Paladin Break 2
episodes.overview: Kogane was a Nebula spy. Grand Paladin is destroyed, and Takashi, alone, has to fight off the Sealing Faction. Will Soya help him, even if they're enemies?

episodes.name: Sirius
episodes.overview: The battle is over, and Grand Paladin and the Sealing Faction have both been driven off. But what comes next?

episodes.name: Power Is What Dwells Within Your Own Self
episodes.overview: The vials are now in posession of the pacifists, but the battle isn't over. They were simply the key to unlock Grand Paladin's psychic powers. Now, afraid for what humanity may become, some of Grand Paladin are joining with the sealing faction.

episodes.name: Messenger of Awakening
episodes.overview: Benika is accidentally sealed, and now she dreams that everything she ever wanted is hers. But the sealing faction is far from finished...

episodes.name: Karellen and Rashaverak
episodes.overview: After all the skirmishes up to this point, it's now time for the sealing faction and pacifists to settle things with one, decisive battle.

episodes.name: Azrabarakura
episodes.overview: Years have passed, and the characters have all grown up. The dragon is about to awaken, and it's up to them to seal him away.

episodes.name: Behold, The Universe is Filled With Blessings
episodes.overview: The dragon has awoken on the moon, and is threatening to destroy Earth like it did Sirius. Nebula has a plan to seal him, but can the people of Earth put their hatred towards him aside after everything that happened?
